bugs.title: CVE-2021-29622 prometheus: open redirect under the /new endpoint

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-29622 prometheus: open redirect under the /new endpoint

long_desc.thetext:
Prometheus is an open-source monitoring system and time series database. In 2.23.0, Prometheus changed its default UI to the New ui. To ensure a seamless transition, the URL's prefixed by /new redirect to /. Due to a bug in the code, it is possible for an attacker to craft an URL that can redirect to any other URL, in the /new endpoint. If a user visits a prometheus server with a specially crafted address, they can be redirected to an arbitrary URL. The issue was patched in the 2.26.1 and 2.27.1 releases. In 2.28.0, the /new endpoint will be removed completely. The workaround is to disable access to /new via a reverse proxy in front of Prometheus.

Reference:
https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/security/advisories/GHSA-vx57-7f4q-fpc7

Affects: epel-all [bug 1962720]

https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/compare/v2.26.0...v2.26.1

bugzilla.short_desc: Additional options on systemd prometheus service

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:


Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
golang-github-prometheus-2.24.1-5.el8.x86_64


Additional info:

Hello, 

As we have to add some Additional options when we execute prometheus server bin, like --web.enable-admin-api

we have to override the conf of the systemd service like bellow 

systemctl cat prometheus.service 
# /usr/lib/systemd/system/prometheus.service
[Unit]
Description=Prometheus service monitoring system and time series database
Documentation=https://prometheus.io/docs/introduction/overview/ man:prometheus(1)
Wants=network-online.target
After=network-online.target

[Service]
Restart=on-failure
EnvironmentFile=/etc/sysconfig/prometheus
User=prometheus
Group=prometheus
ExecStart=/usr/bin/prometheus \
          --config.file=${CONFIG_FILE} \
          --storage.tsdb.path=${STORAGE_TSDB_PATH} \
          --web.console.libraries=${WEB_CONSOLE_LIBRARIES_PATH} \
          --web.console.templates=${WEB_CONSOLE_TEMPLATES_PATH} \
          --web.listen-address=${WEB_LISTEN_ADDRESS}
ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID
TimeoutStopSec=20s
SendSIGKILL=no

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

# /etc/systemd/system/prometheus.service.d/override.conf
# Ansible managed: from template /opt/kookel/ansible/ops/playbooks/roles/ops_install_prometheus_server/templates/overr>
[Service]
ExecStart=
ExecStart=/usr/bin/prometheus \
          --config.file=${CONFIG_FILE} \
          --storage.tsdb.retention=${STORAGE_RETENTION} \
          --storage.tsdb.path=${STORAGE_TSDB_PATH} \
          --web.console.libraries=${WEB_CONSOLE_LIBRARIES_PATH} \
          --web.console.templates=${WEB_CONSOLE_TEMPLATES_PATH} \
          --web.listen-address=${WEB_LISTEN_ADDRESS} \
          --web.enable-admin-api


Is it possible to add a variable on the /etc/sysconfig/prometheus with a Name like 
ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS=""

and also to add it on the /usr/lib/systemd/system/prometheus.service

to be able to only customize the /etc/sysconfig/prometheus and do not anymore make a override of systemd prometheus service


Thanks a lot for your support.

Regards, 

David Taillois

and on the line 18 :  ${ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS}

For you problem, you should use an override systemd file (created with systemctl edit) instead of editing the service file directly. You could probably deliver your override file directly too in the /etc/systemd/system/<service>.d directory if you need to automate this change. See https://cubethethird.wordpress.com/2018/01/14/how-to-edit-systemd-unit-files-services/ for help.
